name: template_jobs
description: The jobs template used by SASjs when running sasjs create

scripts.exec: sasjs job execute jobs/extract/makedata1 -l sasjsbuild/makedata1.log -t viya
scripts.flow: sasjs flow execute -s sasjs/jobflow.json -l sasjsbuild --csvFile sasjsbuild/results.csv -t viya
scripts.prepare: git rev-parse --git-dir && git config core.hooksPath ./.git-hooks || true
